PropertyList.name: Engines: Start-up [english]
PropertyList.description: Startup engines with external power unit.

step.message: Connect to External Power Unit. In main menu B707/External Power Unit
The External Power Unit was plugged in.
Switch on the battery.

error.message: Open the cover and switch on the battery.

step.message: SELECTOR LOAD & VOLTS turn to BUS-TIE.

error.message: Use only BUS TIE for the moment.

step.message: ESSENTIAL POWER turn to EXT PWR.
SELECTOR AC PARALLELING set to External Power. The AC source will be synchronized to 400Hz.
AUXILLIARY PUMPS on. Hydraulic pressure for rudder, gear and system support.

error.message: Switch both to on and wait until 3000 PSI RUD HYD PRESS.

step.message: INTERCONNECT VALVE on. AC AUXILLIARY PUMPS support system.
HYD FLUID SHUTOFFs on.

error.message: Open covers and switch on the knobs.

step.message: ENGINE PUMPS on. Hydraulic support for all the residual systems.

error.message: Switch both to on and wait until 2200 PSI HYD SYS PRESS.

step.message: Connect External Power Unit to the SYNC BUS.
Connect the GEN - DRIVES. Open the red cover and switch on the drives. Close cover then.

error.message: Connect all GEN - DRIVES and close then all the covers. Reconnect in flight is impossible.

step.message: BUS-TIE-BREAKER Open all covers and set the BUS-TIE-BREAKER to sync bus. Close cover then.

error.message: Switch on all the buses and close the covers!

step.message: GEN - CONTROL Open all covers and switch on the generator controllers. Close covers then.

error.message: Switch on all controllers and close the covers!

step.message: GEN - BREAKER Close all circuits
Sync every CROSSFEED VALVE to his shut (blue lights out) Turn on and off all valves for sec.

error.message: Open and close the Crossfeed - valves once!

step.message: Switch on the BOOST - PUMPS
Set every ENGINE SHUTOFF - VALVE to ON

error.message: ALL engine SHUTOFF-Valves must be set to on.

step.message: Open cover Starter 3
Push Starter 3 and then pull cutoff.
Pull CUTOFF 3.
Control N2 and the other instrument for this engine
Starter 3 - green light is out?
Close cover 3, open cover 4
Push Starter 4 and then pull cutoff.
Pull CUTOFF 4.
Control N2 and the other instrument for this engine
Starter 4 - wait until green light is out
Close cover 4, open cover 2
Push Starter 2 and then pull cutoff.
Pull CUTOFF 2.
Control N2 and the other instrument for this engine
Starter 2 - wait until green light is out
Close cover 2, open cover 1
Push Starter 1 and then pull cutoff.
Pull CUTOFF 1.
Control N2 and the other instrument for this engine
Starter 1 - wait until green light is out
Close cover 1
control N2 in green range.
SELECTOR AC PARALLELING select GEN I We will synchronize the generators now.
Heed this instrument during synchronisation
Turn FREQ CONTROL knob until white control lights are out.
Select GEN 2 at SELECTOR AC PARALLELING
Turn FREQ CONTROL knob until white control lights are out
Select GEN 3 at SELECTOR AC PARALLELING
Turn FREQ CONTROL knob until white control lights are out
Set SELECTOR AC PARALLELING to GEN 4
Turn FREQ CONTROL knob until white control lights are out
Select GEN 1 on SELECTOR AC PARALLELING for controlling
Close all BUS-TIE-BREAKER, now
Our essential power source is generator 1 now. Turn knob to GEN I
Cutoff connection to the power unit
Unplug external power unit now Select in the main menu: Boeing 707/ External Power Unit
External power unit is switch off
40 Hertz Converter - Controls 115Volt 60 cycle power to the stateroom and the number two galley areas.
Set the Equipment Cooling pumps to ON.
Open the cover for the RAM Air and switch it on.
Start Air Compressor on engine 2.

error.message: Switch to START. If RPM is over 115% restart the compressor.

step.message: Start Air Compressor on engine 3.

error.message: Switch to START. If RPM is over 115% restart the compressor. Also watch the amber lights of compressor 1. Restart if necessary the first one.

step.message: Start Air Compressor on engine 4.

error.message: Switch to START. If RPM is over 115% restart the compressor. Also watch the amber lights of compressors 1 and 2. Restart if necessary those.

step.message: Switch on the WING VALVES.

error.message: Open the cross-body-duct, L and R to OPEN.

step.message: Open the air conditioning unit switches. First open the cover.

error.message: Open both air conditioning units. Set to ON.

step.message: Open the cover of the Safety-Air-valve. Switch the knob to the bottom.

error.message: Switch down the knob, the amber light extinguished.

step.message: Now switch on the Pressurization Auto Mode.
Chose take off position.

end.message: All engines started. Generators closed. Have a nice trip!
